summary: The module provides a high-level API for assembling complete iMODFLOW groundwater flow models by re-exporting core model component classes and offering a simple helper to write the assembled model to disk as a project file.
business_intent: Enable users to programmatically construct, configure, validate, and export iMODFLOW groundwater flow models, facilitating streamlined model development and integration with iMOD5 and iMOD6 workflows.
